description.narrative: Catalyze an improvement in the overall management of Angola’s protected areas network through rehabilitating Iona National Park.
capital of a political entity
populated place

activity-description.narrative: The project will work on improving the infrastructure of Iona National Park, training its staff and developing studies about its flora, fauna and communities in order to rehabilitate the park.

description.narrative: Objective Catalyze an improvement in the overall management of the protected areas network through rehabilitating Iona National Park
4 Number of protected areas in which the METT is adopted as a tool to monitor effectiveness of PA management

comment.narrative: At least 7
The methodology of METT has been adopted for all 7 PAs However only Iona Park has started using the tool for data collection Other parks are expected to come on stream in the near future
At least 7
The methodology of METT has been adopted for all 7 PAs However only Iona Park has started using the tool for data collection Other parks are expected to come on stream in the near future

description.narrative:
5 Management Effectiveness Tracking Tool scorecard
Iona National Park

comment.narrative:
5 points out of 102 possible giving Jan 2012 5
NOTE ON LOGFRAME 2014
We need to make a correction to the baseline In the PRODOC it mentions a 7 rate However 5 points was the final baseline score and all questions were considered none considered na This gives a total possible points of 102 and a percentage of 5 at the baseline

Target achieved but this needs to be independently vetted Considerable improvement in the METT score has been attained since the original evaluation of November 20 2011 The June 2015 METT evaluation returned a score of 32102 31 in comparison with only 5102 5 in 2011 In the 2011 assessment only three questions 1 5 6 were awarded positive scores totaling 5 of a possible 9 points The same total score for these three questions was also awarded in 2015 However of the 39 questions that received zero scores in 2011 23 received positive scores in the recent evaluation indicating a wideranging improvement in management effectiveness The target of at least 45 in the final evaluation is considered attainable

5 points out of 102 possible giving Jan 2012 5
NOTE ON LOGFRAME 2014
We need to make a correction to the baseline In the PRODOC it mentions a 7 rate However 5 points was the final baseline score and all questions were considered none considered na This gives a total possible points of 102 and a percentage of 5 at the baseline

Target achieved but this needs to be independently vetted Considerable improvement in the METT score has been attained since the original evaluation of November 20 2011 The June 2015 METT evaluation returned a score of 32102 31 in comparison with only 5102 5 in 2011 In the 2011 assessment only three questions 1 5 6 were awarded positive scores totaling 5 of a possible 9 points The same total score for these three questions was also awarded in 2015 However of the 39 questions that received zero scores in 2011 23 received positive scores in the recent evaluation indicating a wideranging improvement in management effectiveness The target of at least 45 in the final evaluation is considered attainable

description.narrative: 8 Proportion of the plains grassland habitats of the park 600km2 overgrazed by livestock goats and cattle

comment.narrative: More than 35 by 201112
Less than 20

Not possible to assess the indicator with accuracy but there are good indications that the baseline may have been optimistic and the target even more so The aerial survey is yet to be conducted Observations from the ground indicate an increase of at least 40 of the grassland habitats of the park overgrazed by livestock
Less than 20

Not possible to assess the indicator with accuracy but there are good indications that the baseline may have been optimistic and the target even more so The aerial survey is yet to be conducted Observations from the ground indicate an increase of at least 40 of the grassland habitats of the park overgrazed by livestock
